title: Revenue of KPMG worldwide by region 2010 to 2019
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting EMA, Americas, and Asia Pacific. The y axis indicates the Revenue in billion USD and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall EMA, Americas, and Asia Pacific are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. EMA, 2. Americas, and lastly, 3. Asia Pacific.
Throughout the period, EMA generally had the highest Revenue in billion USD relative to others with an average of 11.81, and it reached its maximum at 2018 with a value of 12.98.
After EMA, Americas overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 9.0, peaking at 2019.
The botommost line, Asia Pacific,  has a mean of 4.16, and peaked at 2019.
Asia Pacific reported the lowest Revenue in billion USD about 3.43 in Year 2010
